snippet.title: End Gate - The Last Passenger (Full Trailer - Indie Game)
snippet.description:
A space exploration 3D game, with you, a gigantic space station, and a strange asteroid, revolving around a black hole. To finish this game the best we can, we launched a Kickstarter Campaign : https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/yggdrasilstudio/end-gate?ref=48l9xb
 
Also, you can play a free demo version here ! 
https://yggdrasil-studio.itch.io/end-gate

We are two friends, with a lot of common passions, like every friends should have. But we have a strong one, which is video game. One guy is all about visual, art, cinema, 3D modelling and special effects, and the other guy is more about tech, programming and coding stuff.
And one day, the design guy finished Outer Wilds and Portal 2 in a row, and had an idea. He shared it with the code guy, and they both started an impossible task : making a whole game, in 3D, whithout so much knowledge in video-game creation. In one year. That's tough.
